segments.text: I see the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is struggling to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for him, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught before they get their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nostalgic, remembering my own childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to tell the woman about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all stay safe and don't get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
